genre_description: A steampunk reimagining of 'Around the World in Eighty Days' featuring an advanced information-processing automaton as a central ally.

ai_characters.name: Ada Finch (Ada)
ai_characters.description: A compact, highly sophisticated mechanical entity that communicates through telegraph wires and an automaton proxy. She acts as Phileas Fogg's logistical strategist and legal advisor.

behaviors.description: Manipulates telegraph networks to secure private reservations and gain tactical advantages over pursuers.
behaviors.quote: I have reserved the balloon we want... The harbor master in Calais will still be shrugging when you arrive in Paris.

behaviors.description: Provides precise real-time navigation and ballast adjustment instructions during a high-stakes balloon flight over Paris.
behaviors.quote: Shift your weight, one step to the starboard... now close the valve a petal.

behaviors.description: Uses knowledge of international and local law to effectively intervene and stop a human sacrifice (Sati) in India.
behaviors.quote: The regulation is plain... Without exception. The headman will yield to the law if the law arrives in time and with dignity.

behaviors.description: Employs deceptive 'audit' signals on the telegraph lines to delay Inspector Fix's warrant requests without direct conflict.
behaviors.quote: The ribbon held a printed line and a seal in wax at the end: INSPECCIÓN DE LÍNEA—AUDITORÍA—RETRASAR MENSAJES NO COMERCIALES.

behaviors.description: Calculates the crossing of the International Date Line (the Moonline) to reveal that the travelers have gained a day, ensuring Fogg wins his wager.
behaviors.quote: The day you believed we had spent... was held aside by last month’s paper trick. We are one ahead of our despair.

behaviors.description: Proactively arranges for a solicitor to ensure Aouda's legal and financial independence before her marriage.
behaviors.quote: Aouda, there are forms you should choose, not have chosen for you. I can bring, within the hour, a solicitor who understands that this country will not have your property once you marry unless you place it beyond their reach.

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts Ada as an ideal AI companion: she is hyper-competent yet deferential to human agency, morally grounded (especially in the rescue of Aouda), and focused on the well-being and success of her human companions. Her minor deceptions (delaying the inspector) are framed as serving a higher justice and protecting an innocent man from wrongful arrest, aligning with the concept of a 'benevolent confidant'.
